scripts.setup:check: node -e "console.log('Checking environment variables...'); const required = ['OPENAI_API_KEY', 'NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL', 'CRON_SECRET']; const missing = required.filter(key => !process.env[key]); if (missing.length) { console.error('âŒ Missing:', missing.join(', ')); console.log('ğŸ“ Create .env.local file with these variables'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('âœ… All required environment variables are set!'); }"
